content:
an exception for a pregnancy due
to rape? Certainly. They can say that persons have a right to life only if they
didn’t come into existence because of rape; or they can say that all persons
have a right to life, but that some have less of a right to life than others, in par-
ticular, that those who came into existence because of rape have less. But these
statements have a rather unpleasant sound. Surely the question of whether
you have a right to life at all, or how much of it you have, shouldn
